data.comment: The match is underway in Leverkusen.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 2, Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in B. Munich.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
In the minute 6, Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Leverkusen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside B. Munich's half?
Felix Zwayer awards B. Munich a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Leverkusen at BayArena.
Felix Zwayer signals a B. Munich throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leverkusen.
In the minute 11, B. Munich have a goal kick.
Nadiem Amiri (Leverkusen) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 14, Leverkusen take a 1-0 lead thanks to Patrik Schick.
That's a fine assist from Nadiem Amiri.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of B. Munich.
In the minute 16, Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to Leverkusen's area.
In the minute 18, B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
Patrik Schick gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leverkusen.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for B. Munich at BayArena.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 22, Leverkusen's Moussa Diaby misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for B. Munich at BayArena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Leverkusen's Moussa Diaby gets in a shot but it is blocked by a B. Munich defender.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
B. Munich's Serge Gnabry has been booked in Leverkusen.
In the minute 27, Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In Leverkusen, Serge Gnabry of B. Munich is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Leverkusen's Patrik Schick is whistled for offside at BayArena.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Moussa Diaby (Leverkusen) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kingsley Coman for B. Munich who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 32, Kingsley Coman (B. Munich) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Leroy Sane.
Throw-in for B. Munich at BayArena.
Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Niklas Sule of B. Munich gets in a strike, but is off target.
Felix Zwayer awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leverkusen.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Leverkusen.
Throw-in high up the field for Leverkusen in Leverkusen.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, B. Munich to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Robert Lewandowski.
Thomas Muller with an assist there.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to B. Munich.
Robert Lewandowski (B. Munich) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
In the minute 45, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Can B. Munich capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Important block from the Leverkusen defence as Robert Lewandowski fires in a strike for B. Munich.
In the minute 45, B. Munich push forward at BayArena and Robert Lewandowski gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leverkusen defence.
B. Munich push upfield but Felix Zwayer quickly pulls them for offside.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Felix Zwayer has blown to start the second-half.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
B. Munich drive upfield and Thomas Muller gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leverkusen defender.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Throw-in for Leverkusen at BayArena.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
In the minute 51, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Leverkusen just outside B. Munich's area.
Leverkusen are whistled for offside.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 54, Free kick B. Munich.
Leverkusen needs to be cautious. B. Munich have an attacking throw-in.
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 58, Leverkusen push forward at BayArena and Moussa Diaby gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined B. Munich defence.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of B. Munich.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Throw-in for Leverkusen close to the penalty box.
Felix Zwayer signals a Leverkusen throw-in in B. Munich's half.
In the minute 60, Felix Zwayer signals a Leverkusen throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Leverkusen pushes forward through Nadiem Amiri, whose finish on goal is saved.
B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 63, Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
B. Munich drives forward and Serge Gnabry gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 67, Serge Gnabry for B. Munich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at BayArena.
Robert Lewandowski for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 68, Joshua Kimmich is replacing Corentin Tolisso for the away team.
Throw-in for Leverkusen close to the penalty box.
B. Munich make their third substitution with Jamal Musiala replacing Leroy Sane.
In the minute 71, Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Leverkusen.
Leon Bailey (Leverkusen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 73, B. Munich's Thomas Muller gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
Free kick B. Munich.
In the minute 74, Peter Bosz (Leverkusen) is making a first substitution, with Kerem Demirbay replacing Leon Bailey.
Can Leverkusen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside B. Munich's half?
Leverkusen drive forward but Moussa Diaby is judged offside.
In the minute 77, Felix Zwayer awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
Jamal Musiala (B. Munich) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 80, Patrik Schick is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leverkusen's Patrik Schick looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 82, Peter Bosz (Leverkusen) has taken off Patrik Schick who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Lucas Alario is the replacement.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Leverkusen.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of B. Munich.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen's Lucas Alario has run offside.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Alario of Leverkusen is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in B. Munich.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
Robert Lewandowski (B. Munich) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Robert Lewandowski.
Great play from Joshua Kimmich to set up the goal.
